item.title: XPeng Gets Price Target Hike After Upbeat Q2 Earnings, Positive Guidance: Retail Hopes Firm Will Hit Profitability Ahead Of Schedule
item.description: An analyst raised the price target on XPeng to $26 from $25 while keeping a ‘Buy’ rating on the shares.
